name: The Original Mix Classic Bloody Mary (a k a the Red Snapper)
keywords: black pepper, tomato juice, vodka, spring
recipeIngredient: 4 ounces tomato juice (low-sodium tomato juice can be used)

recipeInstructions.text: Place Worcestershire sauce, peppers, salt and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker or a wide-mouth jar. Add ice, vodka and tomato juice. Shake well.
Pour into a highball glass or goblet.
